abstract: World Food Program warns of impending famine in Malawi affecting 2.8 million people after severe floods and drought ruin 2015 harvest; says it needs over $80 million to fund Malawi relief operation.
lead_paragraph: More than 2.8 million people will not have enough to eat over the next several months because of floods and drought.

headline.main: Malawi: U.N. Warns of a Food Crisis
headline.print_headline: Africa; Malawi: U.N. Warns of an Impending Food Crisis

snippet: More than 2.8 million people will not have enough to eat over the next several months because of floods and drought.
